sentences.en: a woman well versed in the art of diplomacy
Be versed in electric components, circuit design, measurement and test.
sentences.cn: 精通电子元器件 、 电路设计 、 测量和测试.

sentences.en: He is well - versed in kung fu , and is of no ordinary talent.
sentences.cn: 他武功盖世, 是个好身手.

sentences.en: He is well versed in English literature.
He is well versed in history.
He is well versed in The Analects of Confucius.
He is well versed in the science of optics.
He versed himself in European literature.
He was already versed in Greek.
He was well versed in employment law.
He was well versed in Judaism and in the Mithraism and Alexandrian religion of the day.
sentences.cn: 他精通犹太教、密特拉教以及当代的亚历山大宗教.

sentences.en: Page is well versed in many styles of jazz.
sentences.cn: 佩奇精通多种风格的爵士乐。

sentences.en: Seeing the picture, we see that this painter is very versed.
sentences.cn: 看到这幅画就知道这位画家的画功很深.

sentences.en: The three sisters are all well - versed in the mechanism of novel writting.
sentences.cn: 三姊妹都熟谙写小说的技巧.

sentences.en: The three sisters were all well - versed in the mechanism of novel writing.
sentences.cn: 三姐妹都熟谙写小说的技巧.

words.tran_cn: 熟练的；熟悉的；通晓的；精通的

trans.tran_en: to know a lot about a subject, method etc
